description: With KÜHL’s innovative venting system and a nine-pocket design, the AMBUSH™ Cargo Men’s Short allows you to stay cool, comfortable, and prepared. Their exclusive ÜberKÜHL® STRETCH fabric delivers lightweight and quick dry performance for premium comfort and protection (UPF 50) under the sun.
name: Kuhl Ambush Cargo Shorts, 12" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Überkühl® Stretch 68% Cotton, 29% Nylon, 3% Spandex 5.2 oz
